All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddAppointmentController
    FXML Controller class for the Add Appointment scene
    AddCustomerController
    FXML Controller class for the add customer scene
    Appointment
    The Appointment class contains all of the data necessary to record company appointments.
    AppointmentImpl
    The DAO Implementation for the Appointment Model.
    Contact
    The Contact class contains the data necessary to give an appointment a Contact.
    ContactImpl
    The DAO Implementation for the Contact Model.
    ContactScheduleController
    FXML Controller class for the contact schedule scene.
    Country
    The Customer class contains the data necessary to identify a Country
    CountryImpl
    The DAO Implementation for the Country Model.
    Customer
    The Customer class contains all of the Customer information necessary for scheduling appointments.
    CustomerImpl
    The DAO Implementation for the Customer Model.
    DAOInterface<T>
    The DAO Interface for the application.
    DashboardController
    FXML Controller class for the dashboard scene.
    DateTimeInput
    A functional interface for gathering date and time related user input.
    DB
    A class used to establish, reference and close a connection to a mySQL database.
    Division
    The Division class contains the id, name and country id data necessary to map division names to their countries.
    DivisionImpl
    The DAO Implementation for the Division Model.
    GroupCount
    A class for storing the results of mySQL COUNT and GROUP BY queries.
    InputValidator
    A class that validates the input from various kinds of UI controls.
    Logger
    A class to log Login attempts by any users.
    LoginHandler
    A class that handles login attempts by the User.
    LoginScreenController
    FXML Controller class for the login scene
    Query
    A class used to create and retrieve PreparedStatements.
    Scheduler
    An appointment scheduling application for a company with operations in multiple counties/time zones
    TimeConversion
    A Class used to convert different Time classes and localize times to specific TimeZones.
    UpdateAppointmentController
    FXML Controller class for the UpdateAppointment scene.
    UpdateCustomerController
    FXML Controller class of the UpdateCustomer scene.
    User
    The User class contains the information necessary to authenticate employees using the Scheduling application.
    UserImpl
    The DAO Implementation for the User Model.
